name: Distribution in kind
text: [§425E-506]  Distribution in kind.  A partner shall not have a right to demand or receive any distribution from a limited partnership in any form other than cash.  Subject to section 425E-812(b), a limited partnership may distribute an asset in kind to the extent each partner receives a percentage of the asset equal to the partner's share of distributions. [L 2003, c 210, pt of §1]
